# K
## Overview
| **Feats** | **Prerequisites** | **Benefits** |
|---|---|---|
| Keen Scent | Wis 13, half-orc or orc | Gain the scent special ability |
| Ki Throw\* | Improved Trip, Improved Unarmed Strike | Throw opponent into adjacent square with a trip attack |
| Kick Up\* | Dex 12, Acrobatic, Acrobatics 1 rank, slayer level 1st or swashbuckler level 1st | Retrieve an unattended item as a swift action |
| Killing Flourish\* | Intimidating Prowess, Intimidate 4 ranks, slayer level 4th | When melee attacks reduce a foe to below 0 hit points, demoralize those around you |
| Kinetic Counter | Cold simple blast, fire simple blast, or water simple blast; kinetic blast class feature | Use kinetic blast to counter an opposing element |
| Kinetic Leap | Acrobatics 3 ranks, kinetic blast class feature | Use blast to add +10 on Acrobatics checks to jump (+20 at 10 ranks) |
| Knack for Magic | — | +2 bonus on Spellcraft skill checks; also gain the following spell-like abilities as a 1st-level caster: 1/day—*detect magic, light,* and *prestidigitation* |
| Knight Training | — | Multiclass with paladin levels |
| Knockout Artist | Sneak attack class feature, Improved Unarmed Strike | Gain +2 damage per sneak attack when dealing nonlethal sneak damage |

  \* This is a combat feat, and can be selected as a brawler, fighter, gunslinger, swashbuckler, and warpriest bonus feat.
